# Function typeof

Determines the type of a variable.


## Syntax

```js
math.typeof(x)
```

### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`x` | * | 

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
String | Lower case type, for example 'number', 'string', 'array'.
